mapper.select: SELECT uuid, member_role as role, name, rrn, phone, create_date, update_date, delete_date FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT uuid, name FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE member_role = 'R002'
SELECT uuid, name, CASE member_role WHEN 'R002' THEN '의사' WHEN 'R003' THEN '간호사' END as role FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE member_role = 'R002' OR member_role = 'R003'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (uuid, member_role, name, rrn, phone) VALUES (#{uuid}, 'R004', #{name}, #{rrn}, #{phone})
